resources.string: Search for Treasure Items that are active and bring them to the garden. \n \n In order to get treasure items, you need to scan QR-codes.
Make sure that the QR-codes that you find are activated. \n \n The big screen will show you where to find these active QR-codes.
Scan the found QR-code to access the treasure item. \n \n Bring back the treasure item to the garden to receive your reward.
This treasure spot was empty! \nTry scanning at another treasure spot.
Bring the found item to the home spot. Scan the plant´s QR-code to receive your reward!
Could not connect. \nCheck your internet settings and try again.
You have no treasure! Go scan a treasure spot and bring back a treasure.
